issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h6.Issue Description
For Appcelerator Studio: 

(1) Run and Debug work fine for our iOS app in the simulator on our corporate network. 

(2) Run and Debug work fine for our iOS app in the simulator when I'm home on my wireless network. 

(3) When connected to our Enterprise network from home (using our Cisco AnyConnect VPN client over my wireless network): 
(a) Run works fine. 
(b) Debug does not work. 

For this last case, the simulator starts up, the desktop shows, the splash screen shows, and then I eventually see the attached dialog in Studio and this in the Studio console: 

{code}
[INFO] : Focusing the iOS Simulator 
[DEBUG] : Found iPhone Simulator log file: /Users/ja316153/Library/Application Support/iPhone Simulator/7.1/Applications/F9C76AA5-9D78-4364-BA90-40DB8BEAAF25/Documents/ded35832-79e1-45a3-b363-16182358f6e2.log 
-- Start simulator log ------------------------------------------------------- 
[DEBUG] : Reading stylesheet from: /Users/ja316153/Library/Application Support/iPhone Simulator/7.1/Applications/F9C76AA5-9D78-4364-BA90-40DB8BEAAF25/MSA-MRT.app/stylesheet.plist 
[INFO] : Application started 
[DEBUG] : 2015-04-16 22:40:02.518 MSA-MRT[10536:70b] You've implemented -[<UIApplicationDelegate> application:performFetchWithCompletionHandler:], but you still need to add "fetch" to the list of your supported UIBackgroundModes in your Info.plist. 
[INFO] : MSA-MRT/3.3.24 (3.2.3.GA.b958a70) 
[DEBUG] : 2015-04-16 22:40:02.520 MSA-MRT[10536:70b] You've implemented -[<UIApplicationDelegate> application:didReceiveRemoteNotification:fetchCompletionHandler:], but you still need to add "remote-notification" to the list of your supported UIBackgroundModes in your Info.plist. 
[ERROR] : Error connecting to debugger: Error Domain=NSPOSIXErrorDomain Code=60 "The operation couldnÂ¹t be completed. Operation timed out" 
{code}
fields.summary: Cannot run Appc Studio in "Debug" mode when on VPN

comments.body: Closing ticket due to the information that was requested not being provided.
